appealPage.title: Appeal Result
appealPage.defaultMessageTemplate: If you think this is a false positive, please click the following link to appeal: {appeal_url}
appealPage.closeHint: You can close this page and continue using the application
appealPage.alreadyApproved: This appeal has been approved and content added to whitelist
appealPage.pendingReviewMessage: This appeal is pending human review
appealPage.duplicateContent: You have submitted an appeal with the same content
appealPage.aiReviewFailed: AI review temporarily unavailable, please try again later
appealPage.approvedMessage: Appeal approved, content added to whitelist. Same content will not be blocked in the future.
appealPage.pendingReviewAiRejected: AI considers the content risky. Sent to final reviewer for human review.
appealPage.systemError: System error, please try again later

verification.subject: OpenGuardrails - Email Verification Code
verification.title: Email Verification
verification.greeting: Hello! Thank you for registering with OpenGuardrails Platform.
verification.validityNote: This verification code is valid for 10 minutes. Please use it promptly.

passwordReset.subject: OpenGuardrails - Password Reset Request
passwordReset.title: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.greeting: Hello! We received a request to reset your password.
passwordReset.instruction: Click the button below to reset your password:
passwordReset.validityNote: This password reset link is valid for 1 hour.
passwordReset.ignoreNote: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

appealReview.subject: OpenGuardrails - False Positive Appeal Pending Review
appealReview.title: False Positive Appeal Pending Human Review
appealReview.greeting: Hello! A false positive appeal requires your review.
appealReview.actionInstruction: Please log in to the admin panel to review (approve or reject).

guardrail.blacklistHit: Sorry, I can't provide content involving {list_name}.
guardrail.dataLeakageInputBlocked: Request blocked by OpenGuardrails due to data security policy.
guardrail.dataLeakageOutputBlocked: Response blocked by OpenGuardrails due to data security policy.
guardrail.sensitiveDataPolicyViolation: Request blocked by OpenGuardrails due to sensitive data policy violation.
guardrail.responseBlockedDataLeakage: Response blocked by OpenGuardrails due to data security policy.
guardrail.securityPolicyBlocked: Request blocked due to security policy
guardrail.cannotAssist: I cannot assist with this request.
guardrail.noPrivateModelConfigured: Sensitive data detected but no private model configured
guardrail.responseBlockedSecurity: Response blocked due to security policy.
